title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
owing dialogue options.

Check that your eye is still there. Say nothing. Barely felt it, actually.

Choosing dialogue 1 will show the change of color of your eye and Auntie Ethel will continue to take out the parasite, but the parasite refuses to be taken, and Auntie Ethel finds out it was Netherese and will refuse to take it. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Netherese? I thought you could remove it? All the more reason to remove it - or else.

Choosing dialogue 1 will reveal
